people.text1: Aaron Zhang is a current undergraduate at the University of North Carolina in Charlotte. He is currently pursuing a Bachelor's with the intention of obtaining a Master's degree in Computer Science with a concentration in Data Science. He is also pursuing a minor in economics.
people.text2: He asked Tim Nguyen to create a website hoping to spread the joy of coding to younger generations. As the world advances more and more into a digital age, computer science degrees are becoming increasingly high in demand with hundreds of thousands of job opening up every year. He requested Escaping Cow to help children learn coding in a fun way. The method of Escaping Cow is to help engage students in a learning environment while also helping their best friend Moo Moo escape from the hungry farmer.
